Description: --> Motor City Pawn Brokers 99.9% Positive Feedback eBay store About Us Listings Contact US WEBSITE Gibson "Flying V" Made In U.S.A - 1997 - Black - Right Handed - Electric Guitar Gibson "Flying V" Made In U.S.A - 1997 - Black - Right Handed - Electric Guitar Brand: Gibson Model : "Flying V"Includes : Gibson "Flying V" Electric Guitar And Gibson Branded Case DESCRIPTION This Electric Guitar is in Good cosmetic condition and would be considered a "players" guitar. The headstock has couple small nicks and light scratches. The tuning machines move and hold tune as intended. The neck is straight with no signs of truss rod issues but has a few indentations near the middle. The fingerboard is clean with little wear to the frets. The top has some scratches and signs of wear which is typical from prior use and ownership. The sides and edges have a couple scratches as well however, they are free of chips and dings. The knobs and toggle switch are moving smoothly and properly as intended. The back has light signs of buckle rash. Title: Gibson "Flying V" Made In U.S.A - 1997 - Black - Right Handed - Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: This Electric Guitar is in Good cosmetic condition and would be considered a "players" guitar. The headstock has couple small nicks and light scratches. The tuning machines move and hold tune as intended. The neck is straight with no signs of truss rod issues but has a few indentations near the middle. The fingerboard is clean with little wear to the frets. The top has some scratches and signs of wear which is typical from prior use and ownership. The sides and edges have a couple scratches as well however, they are free of chips and dings. The knobs and toggle switch are moving smoothly and properly as intended. The back has light signs of buckle rash. Please see images.
